en: How do you get to the academy?
First, I walk to the bus stop.
It takes about five minutes on foot.
Then I take the bus to the subway station.
ko: 그런 다음에 버스타고 지하철 역까지 가

en: What subway line do you take?
Then I transfer to line number two.
How long does the whole trip take?
It takes about an hour and a half if there's no traffic.
